channel.title: We've got Hamachi:
channel.description:
Instead of having Hamachi on the server status, why not switch that out with RSC Servers?
Since it appears people can't advertise on the forums I think it would help out in the part.

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:204920”]I am going to rewrite the serverstatus page soon to verify that moparscape can log into it. I guess I could put up an RSC page then, really at the current time there is no reason a person could not advertise an RSC server on the standard serverstatus page.[/quote]True, but it forces them to look for RSC servers on the list. Or, posters can just prefix their server name with RSC:, etc. But you know the community here, they’ll start to complain about uptimes. Especially with RSC servers.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I am going to rewrite the serverstatus page soon to verify that moparscape can log into it. I guess I could put up an RSC page then, really at the current time there is no reason a person could not advertise an RSC server on the standard serverstatus page.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

I definitely agree.
Make sure it’s not spam able though, the hamachi status page just became a chat box.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:8, topic:204920”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=270541.msg2220048#msg2220048 date=1210485585]
Well, I do agree that hamachi should be removed, as it is very harmful to your computer. It’s a conspiracy, but I think we should just add an addition. Hamachi is however for those who cannot portforward, and maybe someday the people who can’t figure out will, but we shouldn’t exclude them from not being able to advertise their server whatsoever.
[/quote]
Yes we should.[/quote]
Yea, if they can’t figure out how to PortForward I doubt they can help this community.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Tico135:

Well, I do agree that hamachi should be removed, as it is very harmful to your computer. It’s a conspiracy, but I think we should just add an addition. Hamachi is however for those who cannot portforward, and maybe someday the people who can’t figure out will, but we shouldn’t exclude them from not being able to advertise their server whatsoever.

Yes we should.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Well, I do agree that hamachi should be removed, as it is very harmful to your computer. It’s a conspiracy, but I think we should just add an addition. Hamachi is however for those who cannot portforward, and maybe someday the people who can’t figure out will, but we shouldn’t exclude them from not being able to advertise their server whatsoever.

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

I wonder why it wasn’t there in the first place. Hm.

Another thing is, the members here dont use Hamachi to be part of a network and for those networking purposes. Instead, they use it because they couldn’t find out how to port-forward. This also indicates the server being hosted on Hamachi was fixed using copy and paste tutorials, and is the reason why I think it should be removed. Otherwise, Moparisthebest would also have to allow RSC Servers to be posted on the Hamachi page.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Like ThugLife said, why not just leave it, and add an RSC tab as well. It couldn’t hurt, I mean, if we want to try and eliminate all advertising of servers on the forums this would be a good idea.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Are you saying a separate section for servers that use Hamachi? It could work, because Hamachi is for jews.

Mopar could just add another section for rsc servers to keep everyone happy.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got Hamachi:
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

No.
I’m saying that take hamachi away and replace it with RSC Server advertisement.

Read full topic
